_sText:
De_toxin_50 release notes

Map Name: de_toxin_50
Author: Scott "eXpendabLe" Hilbrands
Release Date: 05.05.05

Counter-Strike:Source Game Level

* Number of Spawn Points: 50 - 25t and 25ct

* Info:
Counter-Terrorists must prevent the bombing of toxic storage tanks in this industrial complex.

Terrorists: Destroy one of the storage tanks and release the toxins.

Other Notes: Layout of this map is straightforward: CT and Terror spawns are connected by an overhead passageway and a drainage canal. Designed to provide both sniping and close quarters combat.

Fix List/Updates - 05/05/05
1. increased spawn points to 50
2. fixed "disapearing player" spots
3. fixed fading barrels/props
4. added ambient water sounds
5. reworked Bomb Spot A area
6. various geometry tweaks.

Installation Instructions:
Place contents of this zip file into the following directory:

C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\steam_name_here\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps 



=========================================================================================

Please report bugs and or suggestions to:

shilbrands@cox.net

Enjoy!
